entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Liard River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:42 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
